I believe, this is a problem "in general", not just for me.
At the very least you should mention in the installation instructions that there is a dependency on MS Visual C++ 2015 Redistributable package.
But an additional artifact (<classifier>static</classifier>) would have been a better solution, I believe.

P.S. I've already obtained the msvcp140.dll and placed it into a folder in PATH. So everything works for me.

body:
I believe, this is a problem "in general", not just for me.
At the very least you should mention in the [installation instructions](https://www.tensorflow.org/install/install_java#install_on_windows) that there is a dependency on MS Visual C++ 2015 Redistributable package.
But an additional artifact (`<classifier>static</classifier>`) would have been a better solution, I believe.

P.S. I've already obtained the msvcp140.dll and placed it into a folder in PATH. So everything works for me.
